TopicTitle: What is your favourite TV show?

Articles.Content:
I just started watching it about a few weeks ago but i love it!

Mine is: Star trek: Voyager

whats yours?
Mythbusters :3...But I usually have nothing better to do :L
Go ahead. Guess. ;D
I do agree, mythbusters is good, but its repeats right now :S
Doctor Who, duh.

Favorite of all time: The Simpsons

Runners up: Seinfeld, Office (BBC), Perfect Strangers, Lost, Are You Being Served, Golden Girls, Cash Cab, Night Court, IT crowd, PTI

And my most recent favorite show, are you intrigued? Si, si, I\'m very intrigued.

Dan Le Batard is Highly Questionable

Go ahead. Guess. ;D

lol

OT:

My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic

I don\'t really have a favorite, but that\'s because there\'s very few shows on TV that I feel are even worth watching.

-Eureka; it\'s a good show, and sadly in its last season

-Warehouse 13; another good show, but not back in season for another month

-Doctor Who; who doesn\'t love this show?

-Top Gear; the original (British) one, not any of the bad spin-offs
i liked Stargate Universe, and Doctor Who, but my fav right now is Futurama

Our whole universe was in a hot dense state,

And just in front of Ponies and stuff

Big Bang Theory\'s really great! ;D
Star Trek: TNG was great, but I absolutely loved every episode of Futurama.

Agh... For me it\'s either Top Gear, Russell Howard\'s Good News or Mock the Week.

(As it happens, all of them are on BBC...)
It\'s either Futurama, The Simpsons or Star Wars: The Clone Wars.

Here is a list! I can\'t just choose one !

1. The Adventures Of Tintin

2. Star Trek: The Next Generation

3. Star Trek: Voyager

4. Doctor Who (The 10th Doctor rocked!)

5. The Universe

6. Star Trek: DS9

7. Into The Universe With Stephen Hawking

8. Mythbusters

9. Avatar: The Last Airbender

10. The Twilight Zone (Original)

Star Trek: TNG was great, but I absolutely loved every episode of Futurama.

I do agree, but i chose voyager over TNG because not only does voyager look better, have a better intro, but it also has seven of nine

I like Star Trek.

Not ST:TNG or VOY. All of them are great in their own rights. Some I enjoyed more than others (I actually enjoyed TNG more), but they are still all good.

I watch My Little Po PROMPTLY SHOT

Since we don\'t air anything good here, i rely on the internet for shows, especially subbed or english shows (as in, created in an english speaking country to begin with)

This is mostly stuff that used to air on Cartoon Network, yup, and it was pretty good to...
To be honest though, any shows that have prominent appearances of songs rank highly for me already.

That\'s easy Avatar The Last Airbender. If it has to be on tv currently Legend of Korra followed closely by MLP. I really don\'t tv much though nothing really interests me anymore except for stuff on History( which is slowly becoming the Redneck Channel : ) and discovery.
Star trek!
Hey me and GOOMH have the same first show. The still on air show would have to be Adventure Time. (I\'ve been watching the show since it aired 2/3 years ago.)
